original_title: Status Quo - Radio 2 Live in Hyde Park 2016
overview: Status Quo have been rockin' for six decades, notching up 65 hit singles, selling over 100m records worldwide and spending more than 400 weeks in the British singles chart. It's no wonder Francis Rossi and Rick Parfitt from the band were awarded OBEs in 2010 for their services to music...
title: Status Quo - Radio 2 Live in Hyde Park 2016
